RegisterPage.helpMessages1: *These are the steps to follow to complete your registration.
RegisterPage.helpMessages2: *If at any time you need to access a section of the registry, click on the green panel, which is your preference
RegisterPage.step1: How did you know about us?
RegisterPage.infoFrecuency: You did not select keep informed

firstStep.header: Please tell us how you found out about the company's services. It is important to us, because it helps us to improve the service we offer you.
firstStep.tagOthers: Specify, what was the means by which the person who learned about us
firstStep.selectOptions: Select one or more social networkss

secondStep.name: Name
secondStep.warning: Please verify that your data is correct, as it will be used to generate your publication, send you your access data, or notify your payments

fourthStep.informedCheck: I want to stay informed about the services offered by the company, and other aspects of interest

fifthStep.header: How often would you like to be informed about the services offered by the company?
fifthStep.selectCategory: You can select more than 1 category, if you wish
fifthStep.informedWays: Medium(s) by which you would like to be informed
fifthStep.facebook: Private message on my Facebook account
fifthStep.phoneNumber: Verify, or insert the number you want to be informed by
fifthStep.otherWayTag: Specify the means by which you want to be informed
fifthStep.facebookTag: Enter Facebook email address to contact you

sixthStep.warningMessage: It is important that you FORMALIZE your payment to be able to publish your vehicle, through your PAYMENT.
sixthStep.header: Data to be used to facilitate payment notifications
sixthStep.subHeader: We want to help you, facilitating the payment of the publication of your apartment or house, and for which, we ask you to provide the data that you consider using, to make your transfers or deposits, specified below
sixthStep.originCountry: Country where the origin bank account resides

firstSection.title: Suggestion to make your payments
firstSection.paragraph1: It is recommended that you log in to the company's Web portal, so that the data you have provided can be used to facilitate the payment notification process for your publication.
firstSection.paragraph2: Otherwise, you must fill out the requested information on the company's Web portal and on the payment notification portal.

secondSection.title: Steps to notify your payment
secondSection.paragraph1: 1- When you register, the portal generates the customer code, which you see on the screen, and which will be sent to your email, along with your access data.
secondSection.paragraph2: 2- Then use the code provided, and access the company's payment notification system, by clicking here:
secondSection.paragraph3: 3- Enter the customer code, in the payment notification system
secondSection.paragraph4: 4- Press the Notify payment button, in the payment notification system
